rows.title: What is this competition?
rows.content: This is a cricket pool competition you can play with your friends to predict the 4 qualifying playoff teams in this year's IPL competition.

rows.title: What's in it for me?
rows.content: Each participant will pledge X amount of money to enter into the pool and the winner gets all the money plus bragging rights on his/her buddies until the next season.

rows.title: What do I need to provide to enter?
rows.content:
All you need to do is rank the 8 teams in the order of most chances of making the playoffs in your opinion, For example, If you rank them this way,

Mumbai Indians

Delhi Capitals

Sunrisers Hyderabad

Royal Challengers Bangalore

Kolkata Knight Riders

Kings XI Punjab

Chennai Superkings

Rajasthan Royals

And if Kolkata Knight Riders, Delhi Capitals, Royal Challengers Bangalore and Kings XI Punjab make it to the playoffs, you would get a total of 19(4+7+5+3) points

rows.title: How will the winner be decided?
rows.content:
The player with the most number of points at the end of the regular season will win the pool.

In the case of a tie, the player with the most points of the finalist teams will win the pool.

If the tie is not yet broken, the player with the most points of the champion team will win the pool.

If it's still a tie, the tied players will share the money.

rows.title: I'm in. How do I enter?
rows.content: To enter, please click the register button above, fill up the form and submit your preferences. Please note that the registration closes on 04/09/2021 06:00 AM PST.
